name: Rune Chronicles
description:
Combine might and magic to become a powerful adventurer in this action-adventure! Drop into different worlds and environments as you search for all of the magical crystals scattered around the realms. Strike down various types of enemies including the ‘Ol Chap, the Chungus, and the Big Chonk. 

With two worlds to explore and conquer, work to collect all the crystals available by destroying enemy portals, dodging spike traps, and avoiding explosive barrels! Use keys to find potions in treasure chests spread throughout the land in order to help you in your journey.

Recommended Minimum System Requirements

Operating System: Windows 10 or Windows 11

Processor: Pentium G5400

Memory: 500MB

Graphics: GTX 780

Video Memory: 1GB

Storage: 1.5 GB

Credits

A game made over the course of 4 months by 5 Computer Animation and Game Development students for CAGD 470 in the spring 2022 semester.

Producer: Kade Chambers

Programmers: Kade Chambers and Colin Worthen

3D artist and Modeler: Preston Farris 

Level Designers - Andre Lopez, Jacob Tucker
